abstract: Artur Walther, art collector and former partner at Goldman Sachs, travels the world in search of photographers who are respected at home but haven’t yet achieved global recognition; for many artists, Walther's connections and support prove life- and career-changing.
snippet: Artur Walther, a collector and former partner at Goldman Sachs, travels the world in search of artists who are respected at home but haven’t yet achieved global recognition.
lead_paragraph: Artur Walther, a collector and former partner at Goldman Sachs, travels the world in search of artists who are respected at home but haven’t yet achieved global recognition.

headline.main: For Photos, Collector Casts a Global Net
headline.print_headline: For Photos, Collector Casts a Global Net
headline.seo: Artur Walther Casts Global Net in Search of Photographers
